location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: The photograph is foliation with a pencil number, enclosed in a circle, in the top right hand corner of the folio.Condition: The photograph has been glued to a folio in the volume.Dimensions: 97mm x 80mm.

mods.abstract: Aerial photograph mosaic of the Hawar Group of Islands.The mosaic was compiled by RAF Shaibah using aerial photogrammetry, a technique which uses photographs to survey an area of the Earth's surface. The technique uses an overlapping series of photographs taken from an aircraft following a set flight pattern at a fixed altitude.
